title: Zócalo of Ciudad Altamirano
description: The Zócalo of Ciudad Altamirano is the heart of the city, surrounded by shops and cultural spaces. It’s an ideal place to stroll, enjoy local events, and experience the daily life of the community.

title: Balsas River
description: The Balsas River runs through Ciudad Altamirano, providing scenic views and opportunities for boating and fishing. Visitors can enjoy nature and the serene environment along its banks.

title: Local Market
description: The Local Market in Ciudad Altamirano is a vibrant place where you can experience authentic Guerrero culture, taste regional cuisine, and find traditional crafts. It’s a must-visit for those wanting a true local experience.
